sentences.en: a powerful speech
sentences.cn: 有感染力的演讲

sentences.en: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.cn: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.en: Advertising agencies are losing their once-powerful grip on brand marketing.
sentences.cn: 广告代理公司正逐渐丧失曾经对品牌营销的有力控制。

sentences.en: Agricultural interests are some of the most powerful lobbies in Washington.
sentences.cn: 农业利益集团是华盛顿最具影响力的游说团体之一。

sentences.en: Ferries are very powerful and manoeuvrable compared to cargo ships.
sentences.cn: 与货船相比，渡船马力大而且易操纵。

sentences.en: Good teamwork is a powerful tool (= very effective method ) for effective management.
sentences.cn: 良好的团队合作是有效管理的利器。

sentences.en: He looked physically very powerful, athletic in a compact way.
sentences.cn: 他看上去非常强壮，像个敦实的运动员。

sentences.en: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.cn: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.en: His powerful serve was too much for the defending champion.
sentences.cn: 他的大力发球让卫冕冠军难以招架。

sentences.en: In some works, flowers take on a powerful emblematic quality.
sentences.cn: 在一些作品中，花具有强烈的象征意义。

sentences.en: It was the home of the powerful lords of Baux.
sentences.cn: 这是权力显赫的波城领主的故居。

sentences.en: It's a quite profound story, with powerful religious overtones.
sentences.cn: 这个故事寓意深远，具有强烈的宗教色彩。

sentences.en: Maybe there is jealousy, but I think the envy is more powerful.
sentences.cn: 也许是羡慕，但我认为更多的是嫉妒。

sentences.en: People make cutting remarks to help themselves feel superior or powerful.
sentences.cn: 人们说话尖酸刻薄是为了使自己感觉高高在上或是有权有势。

sentences.en: rich and powerful nations
sentences.cn: 富强的国家

sentences.en: The Greeks are still powerful players in world shipping.
sentences.cn: 希腊依然是世界航运业强有力的竞争者。

sentences.en: The more powerful the car the more difficult it is to handle.
sentences.cn: 汽车的功率越大，就越难驾驭。

sentences.en: The once-powerful post unions have been cut down to size.
sentences.cn: 一度很强势的邮政联盟已经威风不再。

sentences.en: This powerful drug is used to tranquilize patients undergoing surgery.
sentences.cn: 这种强效药剂被用来麻醉手术病人。

sentences.en: You're a powerful man — people will listen to you.
sentences.cn: 你是有影响力的人，大家会听你的。

words.tran_cn: 借影响有权势人物以操纵权力的
有动力装置的；以…为动力的
无力的；[劳经] 无能力的，无权的
功率；力量；能力；政权；势力；[数] 幂
促进（power的过去分词）；给…提供动力
激励；供以动力；使…有力量

trans.tran_cn: 有权力的，强有力的，强壮的，效力大的，大功率的，浓的，响亮的，极具感染力的
trans.tran_en: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions
